name: Black Diamond Forged Denim Pants - Women's
description: Soon to be as essential as your favourite cams, the Forged Denim Pants redefine climbing jeans. The exceptionally durable fabric has an incredible strength-to-weight ratio.Cordura Stretch Denim combines cotton, nylon, polyester and elastane for great abrasion resistance, breathability and stretch.Harness-compatible 3-piece waistband won't stretch out.5 pockets plus an integrated brush pocket.Gusseted crotch gives you mobility.Tapered legs let you focus on your footwork.
